text: Nihaduzzaman (born 28 November 1998) is a Bangladeshi cricketer. He made his Twenty20 debut for Rajshahi Kings on 4 November 2017 in the 2017–18 Bangladesh Premier League. He was the joint-leading wicket-taker in the 2017–18 National Cricket League tournament, with 21 dismissals. In October 2018, he was named in the squad for the Chittagong Vikings team, following the draft for the 2018–19 Bangladesh Premier League. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi cricketers Category:People from Rajshahi District Category:Kala Bagan Krira Chakra cricketers Category:Old DOHS Sports Club cricketers Category:Bangladesh under-19 cricketers Category:Rajshahi Kings cricketers Category:Chittagong Vikings cricketers
title: Nihaduzzaman
